sourcesContent:
import { HamburgerIcon } from "@chakra-ui/icons";
import {
  Avatar,
  Box,
  Flex,
  IconButton,
  Drawer,
  DrawerBody,
  DrawerHeader,
  DrawerOverlay,
  DrawerContent,
  DrawerCloseButton,
  DrawerFooter,
  useDisclosure,
  Input,
  Divider,
  Button,
  Stack,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";

const Header = () => {
  const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure();

  return (
    <>
      <Flex
        w="100%"
        h="60px"
        bg="tomato"
        align="center"
        justify="space-between"
        px={4}
      >
        <IconButton
          onClick={onOpen}
          bg="none"
          aria-label="Menu"
          icon={<HamburgerIcon w="25px" h="25px" />}
        />

        <Avatar size="sm" />
      </Flex>

      <Drawer isOpen={isOpen} placement="left" onClose={onClose}>
        <DrawerOverlay>
          <DrawerContent>
            <DrawerCloseButton />

            <DrawerHeader>
              <Avatar size="sm" mr={2} />
              Freddie Wellfair
            </DrawerHeader>

            <Divider />

            <DrawerBody>
              <Stack>
                <Button>Feed</Button>
                <Button>Profile</Button>
                <Button>Starred</Button>
                <Button>Notifications</Button>
                <Button>Settings</Button>
                <Button>Logout</Button>
              </Stack>
            </DrawerBody>
          </DrawerContent>
        </DrawerOverlay>
      </Drawer>
    </>
  );
};

export default Header;
